title: Typorgy
content:
It's a good thing I don't like caramel:   
 [http://www.themicrofoundry.com/other/werthers.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019194823/http:/www.themicrofoundry.com/other/werthers.jpg)   
Check out those classy mixed-up foot serifs.   
And that "g" is to \*die\* for, isn't it just, darling?   
   
hhp
author: hrant
